welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Spring Valley Lake, a charming city known for its beautiful scenery and warm community. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Apple Valley Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport is a small building with basic amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and is the main hub for passenger services at Norton AFB Airport.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo operations and is equipped with specialized facilities for efficient handling and storage of goods.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.
